title: **Bug Splat**
body:
I get bug splat right after champ select on windows 10, so I'm unable to play as every time I relaunch League I get the bug splat when clicking "Reconnect"

 My Laptop is windows 8 and I just updated League on there and tried it and it runs perfectly...

 Any advice on what the problem could be, maybe the problem is something with a windows 10 update?

replies.body: Man i have the same problem...
I'm having the same issue. How did you guys land up fixing it?
So I uninstalled the client completely and redownloaded it on my windows 10 computer and I'm still getting the same error...

I got a little confused because you mentioned being on Windows 8 as well as 10.  This bugspalt error may be due to driver, bad patch file, or driver issues.  I suggest going through each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to tune up your PC and get you back in game.  Let me know if you have any questions.
